title: Huge first inning lifts Tech past SLU in series finale, 18-4 - Tennessee Tech
content: Huge first inning lifts Tech past SLU in series finale, 18-4  Tennessee Tech
description: HAMMOND, La. â€“ A massive burst of offense in the first inning was plenty to help the Tennessee Tech baseball team salvage a victory in its series finale at Southeastern Louisiana Sunday afternoon. The Golden Eagles cruised to an 18-4 victory over the Lions at Pat Kenelly Diamond at Alumni Field.
